title: Awaken shows we need Draven's Ponytail removed for his canon Classic skin.
body:
https://i.imgur.com/mXxLoeV.jpg

Awesome Trailer shows Draven with no ponytail, and we all know he shouldn't have that ponytail in game either.

Clearly Riot's vision currently is a Draven without a ponytail, as it has in players minds for years. This needs to be a season 9 art team priority, chop that thing off.

Mockup of the astonishingly handsome result:

https://i.imgur.com/6v4P5v3.jpg

Also goes for Draven Draven's Ponytail.

Right? I heard my friend talking about this and I thought they where trying to fool me, then I saw the splash art.

“How did I actually miss something so clearly there”

https://media.giphy.com/media/PUBxelwT57jsQ/200.gif
Wait is this some mandela effect  or I simply never noticed a ponytail.....wait...

Yeah he really does, in the ingame model and splash art at least, the ponytail is draped around his shoulder to the front.

A lot of people don't notice, but it sure looks dumb when you do right? A lot of Draven's art doesn't include the ponytail since he was released, not even the art team notices. *but it must be removed*.
Genuinely didn't even notice he had a ponytail until you pointed it out. Consider me #shook.

I only noticed his pony tail on the beast hunter skin

https://static.lolwallpapers.net/2016/01/Beast-Hunter-Draven-Tryndamere-Sejuani.jpg
I want the beasthunter skin to stay like it is now. It's one of the best draven skins in my opinion, i never play with any other skin.

The only reason I will upvote this thread is to make more people aware of Drave's ponytail, because I as well didn't notice. He could use a splash art update, but he probably won't get one since it's very iconic like Teemo's.

On one hand, if anyone can rock that ponytail, it's Draven.
On the other hand, it _does_ take away attention from that glorious Fu Manchu, so I guess it has to go.
